<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback"></a>

# AudioStreamPlayback

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AudioStreamPlaybackInteractive](class_audiostreamplaybackinteractive.md), [AudioStreamPlaybackPlaylist](class_audiostreamplaybackplaylist.md), [AudioStreamPlaybackPolyphonic](class_audiostreamplaybackpolyphonic.md), [AudioStreamPlaybackResampled](class_audiostreamplaybackresampled.md), [AudioStreamPlaybackSynchronized](class_audiostreamplaybacksynchronized.md)

Meta class for playing back audio.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Can play, loop, pause a scroll through audio. See [AudioStream](class_audiostream.md) and [AudioStreamOggVorbis](class_audiostreamoggvorbis.md) for usage.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio Generator Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2759)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_loop_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **_get_loop_count**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_loop_count)

Overridable method. Should return how many times this audio stream has looped. Most built-in playbacks always return ``0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](class_variant.md) **_get_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_parameter)

Return the current value of a playback parameter by name (see [AudioStream._get_parameter_list()](class_audiostream.md#class_AudioStream_private_method__get_parameter_list)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_playback_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **_get_playback_position**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__get_playback_position)

Overridable method. Should return the current progress along the audio stream, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **_is_playing**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing)

Overridable method. Should return ``true`` if this playback is active and playing its audio stream.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__mix"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **_mix**\ (\ buffer\: `AudioFrame*`, rate_scale\: [float](class_float.md), frames\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__mix)

Override this method to customize how the audio stream is mixed. This method is called even if the playback is not active.

\ **Note:** It is not useful to override this method in GDScript or C#. Only GDExtension can take advantage of it.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__seek"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_seek**\ (\ position\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__seek)

Override this method to customize what happens when seeking this audio stream at the given `position`, such as by calling [AudioStreamPlayer.seek()](class_audiostreamplayer.md#class_AudioStreamPlayer_method_seek).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__set_parameter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_parameter**\ (\ name\: [StringName](class_stringname.md), value\: [Variant](class_variant.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__set_parameter)

Set the current value of a playback parameter by name (see [AudioStream._get_parameter_list()](class_audiostream.md#class_AudioStream_private_method__get_parameter_list)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__start"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_start**\ (\ from_pos\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__start)

Override this method to customize what happens when the playback starts at the given position, such as by calling [AudioStreamPlayer.play()](class_audiostreamplayer.md#class_AudioStreamPlayer_method_play).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__stop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_stop**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__stop)

Override this method to customize what happens when the playback is stopped, such as by calling [AudioStreamPlayer.stop()](class_audiostreamplayer.md#class_AudioStreamPlayer_method_stop).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__tag_used_streams"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_tag_used_streams**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_private_method__tag_used_streams)

Overridable method. Called whenever the audio stream is mixed if the playback is active and [AudioServer.set_enable_tagging_used_audio_streams()](class_audioserver.md#class_AudioServer_method_set_enable_tagging_used_audio_streams) has been set to ``true``. Editor plugins may use this method to "tag" the current position along the audio stream and display it in a preview.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_loop_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_loop_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_loop_count)

Returns the number of times the stream has looped.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_playback_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_playback_position**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_playback_position)

Returns the current position in the stream, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_sample_playback"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AudioSamplePlayback](class_audiosampleplayback.md) **get_sample_playback**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_get_sample_playback)

**Experimental:** This method may be changed or removed in future versions.

Returns the [AudioSamplePlayback](class_audiosampleplayback.md) associated with this **AudioStreamPlayback** for playing back the audio sample of this stream.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_is_playing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_playing**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_is_playing)

Returns ``true`` if the stream is playing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_mix_audio"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedVector2Array](class_packedvector2array.md) **mix_audio**\ (\ rate_scale\: [float](class_float.md), frames\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_mix_audio)

Mixes up to `frames` of audio from the stream from the current position, at a rate of `rate_scale`, advancing the stream.

Returns a [PackedVector2Array](class_packedvector2array.md) where each element holds the left and right channel volume levels of each frame.

\ **Note:** Can return fewer frames than requested, make sure to use the size of the return value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_seek"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **seek**\ (\ time\: [float](class_float.md) = 0.0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_seek)

Seeks the stream at the given `time`, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_set_sample_playback"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_sample_playback**\ (\ playback_sample\: [AudioSamplePlayback](class_audiosampleplayback.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_set_sample_playback)

**Experimental:** This method may be changed or removed in future versions.

Associates [AudioSamplePlayback](class_audiosampleplayback.md) to this **AudioStreamPlayback** for playing back the audio sample of this stream.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_start"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **start**\ (\ from_pos\: [float](class_float.md) = 0.0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_start)

Starts the stream from the given `from_pos`, in seconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_stop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **stop**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlayback_method_stop)

Stops the stream.
